battle_description: You've completed the MMRPG Prototype! Thanks for playing to the end! :D

player_quotes.battle_start: They're not very strong, but they're all I have at the moment...
player_quotes.battle_taunt: Please don't hurt any more of my robots...
player_quotes.battle_victory: I... I can't believe we made it! Great work, robots!
player_quotes.battle_defeat: I have nothing left to fight with...
